sentences.english: Before talking he shuttered all windows.
sentences.chinese: 談話前他關好了所有的百葉窗。

sentences.english: Chris unhooked the shutters and went out on the balcony .
sentences.chinese: 克里斯拉開百葉窗，走到了陽臺上。

sentences.english: The slatted window-shade casts a film noir shadow on her.
sentences.chinese: 百葉窗簾在她身上投下朦朧的黑色陰影。

sentences.english: Three horizontal bands of louvers shade each of the three storeys independently.
sentences.chinese: 三組水平的百葉窗分別遮擋三層樓的每一層。

sentences.english: Sunlight filtered through the chinks of the shutters.
sentences.chinese: 陽光從百葉窗的縫隙中透過來。

sentences.english: Next, they came to a bar that had a wooden shutter.
sentences.chinese: 接下來他們來到一個有木百葉窗的酒吧。

sentences.english: Manette, for yourlife, don't touch the blind!
sentences.chinese: 曼內特，有生命危險，別碰百葉窗。

sentences.english: The windows were large with easy to use push button blinds.
sentences.chinese: 窗子很大，按鈕式調整百葉窗。

sentences.english: We darkened the room by closing the shutters.
sentences.chinese: 我們關上百葉窗，使房間變暗了。

sentences.english: Removing Duette blinds is very simple and only requires a drill with a Phillips drill bit.
sentences.chinese: 卸下迪埃特百葉窗非常簡單，只需要一個十字鑽頭鑽。

sentences.english: The shutters thumped the wall in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 在風中，百葉窗簾砰砰地碰着牆。

sentences.english: The shutters went flipflop against the window.
sentences.chinese: 百葉窗撞在窗戶上發出啪嗒啪嗒聲。

sentences.english: And it also has more than 7years' experiences in producing, designing, and selling in wood industry.
sentences.chinese: 專業製造與銷售實木透氣窗及百葉窗系列。

sentences.english: They were putting up the shutters.
sentences.chinese: 他們這會兒正在拉下百葉窗。

sentences.english: The house was painted white, with green shutters and green shingles.
sentences.chinese: 全屋都白漆，百葉窗和屋檐則用綠漆。

sentences.english: It was a church with a shuttered belfry and spire.
sentences.chinese: 那是一座有百葉窗的鐘樓和尖頂的教堂。
